Enabled (TRUE) if the drive selected by the multiplexer must be enabled, Disabled (FALSE) if it must be disabled
Enabled (TRUE) if the motor selected by the multiplexer will run in CW direction (- motion on the screw), Disabled (FALSE) if it will run in CCW direction (+ motion on the screw)
Disabled (FALSE) if the motor selected by the multiplexer must be braking, Enabled (TRUE) if it must be released
Enabled (TRUE) to enable the high-speed motion of the Z axis, Disabled (FALSE) to leave it low-speed

Time (in seconds) to wait after the field electricity of M2 have been powered on
Time (in seconds) to wait after the field electricity of M2 have been powered off
If no new command is sent to M2 within this time (in seconds) after completion of the last command, M2 will be powered off automatically
The fixed X position in mm
If the X position is within fixedXPosition +/- this tolerance, there's no need to adjust it
The fixed Y position in mm
If the Y position is within fixedYPosition +/- this tolerance, there's no need to adjust it

The fixed TiltY position in mm
If the TiltY position is within fixedTiltYPosition +/- this tolerance, there's no need to adjust it
Each time a theremal focus is done, verify the fixed positions (and adjust them if they fall out of the tolerance)

The number of steps to be expected between the time at which the PLC realizes that the brake release signal must be set, and the time that the axis is fully stopped (for Z axis: at low speed)
TRUE if the motor final sense must be ClockWise (- motion on the screw), FALSE if the motor final sense must be CounterClockWise (+ motion on the screw) (for Z axis: at low speed)

The number of steps between the Anti-backlash position (A) and final position (F)

ST.xhtml: initialize := THIS^.processes.initialize.request();
lock := THIS^.processes.lock.request();
unlock := THIS^.processes.unlock.request();
changeOperatingState := THIS^.processes.changeOperatingState.request( state := state );
moveSteps := THIS^.processes.moveSteps.request( axis := axis, steps := steps, cw := cw, fast := fast);
doThermalFocus := THIS^.processes.doThermalFocus.request();
doThermalFocusForStationName := THIS^.processes.doThermalFocusForStationName.request( station := station );
doThermalFocusForStationPosition := THIS^.processes.doThermalFocusForStationPosition.request( station := station );
verifyFixedPositions := THIS^.processes.verifyFixedPositions.request();
powerOn := THIS^.processes.powerOn.request();
powerOff := THIS^.processes.powerOff.request();
abort := THIS^.processes.abort.request();

documentation.xhtml: Name of this function block instance
Buffer to write all logging to
Temporary buffer to write logging by parts (sub-statemachines) to

ST.xhtml: THIS^.parts.powerRelay._log( name := 'powerRelay', buffer := subBuffer); THIS^.parts.heater._log( name := 'heater', buffer := subBuffer); THIS^.parts.x._log( name := 'x', buffer := subBuffer); THIS^.parts.y._log( name := 'y', buffer := subBuffer); THIS^.parts.z._log( name := 'z', buffer := subBuffer); THIS^.parts.tiltX._log( name := 'tiltX', buffer := subBuffer); THIS^.parts.tiltY._log( name := 'tiltY', buffer := subBuffer); THIS^.parts.multiplexer._log( name := 'multiplexer', buffer := subBuffer); THIS^.parts.configManager._log( name := 'configManager', buffer := subBuffer); THIS^.parts.moveStepsProcedure._log( name := 'moveStepsProcedure', buffer := subBuffer); THIS^.parts.movePositionProcedure._log( name := 'movePositionProcedure', buffer := subBuffer); LOGGER( name := name, actualStatus := THIS^.actualStatus, previousStatus := THIS^.previousStatus, buffer := buffer, subBuffer := subBuffer, pHealthStatus := ADR(THIS^.statuses.healthStatus), pBusyStatus := ADR(THIS^.statuses.busyStatus));
